name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of creative writing, such as narrative, character development, and structure. Students will explore different genres, such as fiction, poetry, and non-fiction, and will have the opportunity to develop their own creative writing projects.

name: Food Writing
description: This course focuses on the art and craft of writing about food. Students will learn how to write compelling articles, essays, and restaurant reviews. They will also explore the history and culture of food writing in the United States.

name: Advanced Creative Writing
description: This course builds on the fundamentals of creative writing and explores more advanced topics, such as writing for different media, literary theory, and writing for publication. Students will develop their own writing projects throughout the semester and will have the opportunity to revise and refine their work.
